reviews.review:
Arkadaşlar bu oyunu oynamanın çok kötü yan etkileri var mesela:
Bağımlılık yaptığı için tuvalete gidemiyorsunuz(çişinizi tutmak kötüdür)
Uyku düzeniniz bozuluyor
Yemek yemiyorsunuz
Beyin seviyeniz arttığı için ömrünüz kısalıyor
Seriously, are you still deciding whether to buy this game or not?

O que eu posso dizer desse incrível jogo, marcou gerações. Portal 2 tem uma história marcante e inesquecível, sua jogabilidade, que já era incrível em Portal, foi aprimorada mais ainda na sequência. Quando comprei o jogo não estava esperando muito, já que tinha pago 2 reais. Mas meu Deus, foram os 2 reais mais bem gastos da minha vida! Esse jogo merece ser comprado mesmo com preço cheio (apesar de recomendar esperar as promoções, já que pagar barato nunca é demais). Enfim, comprem e se divirtam com dezenas de horas de jogatina, marquem de jogar o co-op com um amigo. Vcs vão dar as melhores gargalhadas da sua vida.
GOOD! Гейб не умеет считать до трёх
Vooral de multiplayer blijft erg leuk!

1 arkadaşınız varsa oynayınız 
Yoksa gene oynayınız .
ลดเหลือ 18 บาท คุ้มจริงๆ555
双人玩贼好玩，进去之前把抗锯齿打开，鼠标速度调慢点，减轻头晕情况
An incredible Masterpiece of a puzzle game, way less glitches than the first one and a lot longer. Especially with the summer sale event currently on, I really recommend getting it for so cheap.
а вот это топчик, зашло так зашло
Amazing game, great graphics.  Suprised it can run with AAA graphics on 2 GB ram.  Story is amazing.
The AI machine is rude ! 10/10 would get insulted again.
Good stuff, some parts get a bit boring. I did like the background an story stuff

Отличное продолжение, лучшая игра от Вольво.
P.S. Отучитесь больше 8-ми классов в школе. Сложность может показаться высоковатой.

Всем любителям головоломок советую поиграть во второй портал.
Получил массу удовольствия проходя ее благодаря интерестным квестам и легкому непринужденному юмору.
Çok Sevdigim Oyunlardan Buda Arkadaşla Zevkli Tek Başınıza İse Biraz Bunaltıcı Olmakla Birlikte İçinde Gizlenen Hikaye Baya İlgi Çekici Ve Gizemli. 7.5/10
Enjoyable game, the multiplayer mode allows for very enjoyable afternoons
Ótimo para jogar com os amigos, boa jogabilidade e gráficos.
Brilliant game, would recomend it to anyone who likes puzzles.
It's a great game, good plot, really good co-op mode.
Игра   великолепная   но   если  нет  друзей   на   выход
Muito bom pra quem gosta de puzzles

I have never seen a more literal game. Unlike Portal 1 where there was not only 1 portal but 2, Portal 2 actually advertises correctly the number of portals found in the game. And for that reason, I believe Portal 2 is 2x better than Portal 1, and should be nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize for all ADHD members of the world.

Good Game 
Good Puzzle
Good Coop  
But No Portal 3 T_T
Офигенная игра не только для тебя но и для твоей половинки xD
极其逼真的物理引擎！精妙又烧脑的关卡设计！简直是为科幻迷量身打造的。有3D眩晕的就别来了，保证你会吐。

Veľmi zaujímavá, hra odporúčam.

FODA PA GARAI

This is the one of the best puzzle games even to this day.The campaign is just awesome and co-op is still one of my favorite co-op campaigns i played through the co-op 4 times and I still enjoyed.I recommend this game to everyone.
Finde die Story echt gelungen, besonders den Plottwist.

Quite simply one of the greatest games of all time. A wonderfully written single player featuring the voice of Stephen Merchant.

The concept is simple and pure genius. You play as Chell and navigate each level/ puzzle using your Portal gun as well as a few other little things along the way. All the while you are accompanied by a little robot Wheatley and are hounded and hilariously mocked by the super computer GLaDOS. 

The game play is about as perfect  as it can get. Very simple, leaving you to instead explore the world and it's sometimes head scratching puzzles. It's charming, hilarious and never too unfair. What's more I recently got to play through the co-op mode which
I was delighted to discover was as equally engaging, though the story wasn't quite as good. 

I only pray to the Steam gods that this franchise is revisited at some point. It's a game that made love puzzle games and it is an absolute joy to play.

присутствует кооператив где свой сюжет и несколько концовок, если хочется повеселится с другом то это самое то.

если вы любите головоломки то советую к покупке.

Very cool story and it's a good game to come back to if you're ever bored
A very nice satisfying puzzle game with a great story
Loving this game so far, storyline is interesting and controls are simple and straightforward. I should've bought Portal first though.

I very much enjoyed Portal 2. The story was great with nice ending to top it off.
The humor was pretty much on point and I many times laughed at the jokes.
The gameplay is Valve quality and this is the only Valve game, I DON'T want sequel to. (And I mean that in a good way.)
Игры из серии Portal: Одни из моих любимых игр! Игра супер! 5 звёзд! Если бы можно было поставил бы больше звёзд!
Am currently [strike] stuck between portals [/strike] enjoying the infinite flight between portals. 10/10 would recommend
Ez az egyik kedvenc játékom. Mind a történet, mind a kivitelezés megérdemel egy 5 csillagot, egy 2011-es gyártási évhez képest. Nagyon ajánlom!
